group.name: itsp-account
group.label: ITSP Account
group.description: The information that is specific to a given ITSP account.

setting.name: max-number-of-concurrent-calls
setting.label: Maximum calls
setting.description: The maximum number of concurrent calls allowed via the given ITSP. "-1" means "infinity". This is a way of doing a coarse granularity of QOS on the ITSP. When the limit is reached, sipXbridge will return "Service Unavailable".

setting.name: authentication-realm
setting.description: sipXbridge should just take it from authentication challenge

setting.name: user-name
setting.label: User
setting.description: The user name attached to the account.

setting.name: display-name
setting.label: Display name
setting.description: The optional display name for this account.

setting.name: use-global-addressing
setting.label: Global addressing
setting.description: If checked, use the stun determined global address.

setting.name: route-inbound-calls-to-extension
setting.label: Incoming calls destination
setting.description: Determines where to send inbound calls. If empty, inbound calls are directly routed to the specified number in the inbound request and have to be redirected by aliases or dial plan rules.
